DataElement.preferredName: Patient ECOG Performance Status Or Trial Screening Health Care Provider Ineligibility Decision Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator to address the patient's ECOG performance status or ineligibility decided by persons licensed to supply health care.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient ECOG Performance Status Or Trial Screening Health Care Provider Ineligibility Decision
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A performance status scale designed to assess disease progression and its affect on the daily living abilities of the patient._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial._Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities: or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care._The state or quality of being disqualified by law, rule, or provision._A position, opinion, or judgment reached on an issue under consideration.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: ECOG Performance Status Or Trial Screening Health Care Provider Ineligibility Decision
Property.preferredDefinition: A performance status scale designed to assess disease progression and its affect on the daily living abilities of the patient.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.:Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities: or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care.:The state or quality of being disqualified by law, rule, or provision.:A position, opinion, or judgment reached on an issue under consideration.

Concepts.definition: A performance status scale designed to assess disease progression and its affect on the daily living abilities of the patient.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.
Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities: or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care.
The state or quality of being disqualified by law, rule, or provision.
A position, opinion, or judgment reached on an issue under consideration.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have an ECOG per
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have an ECOG performance status of 3 or above, or is deemed medically unable to participate by study investigators or oncology clinician (i.e., referral to hospice)?
